mixed-citation.article-title: Three new genera and five new species of the tribe Meconematini (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae) from Southwestern China

tp:taxon-treatment.tp:nomenclature: Acosmetides trigentis ( Wang, Bian & Shi, 2016 ) gen. et comb. nov.

tp:treatment-sec.p: The original description of the species is exact and the figure is clear (Wang P. et al. 2016). Based on the male tenth abdominal tergite with a notch in the middle of the posterior margin and the middle lobe of the subgenital plate distinct, the species should belong to the genus Acosmetides gen. nov.
The Chinese name of the species is 三Ẍffi异ffl尾ễ (San Tu Ni Yi Shi Wei Zhong).
